news.title: Guns N' Roses hint at Irish tour date with Cryptic Video
news.summary: After their previous 2023 tour failed to provide an Ireland stop, fans are hopeful that the recent video is confirmation for 2026.

news.title: Education Equality says UK Supreme Court religious education ruling "has lessons for Ireland"
news.summary: Education Equality said the ruling was "a resounding vindication" of its campaign for religious education to be made non-compulsory and taught after core school hours.

news.title: Trinity Trails: A fascinating guided journey through the cobbled paths of Ireland's oldest university
news.summary: From just €16 per person, a Trinity Trails walking tour offers great value and a fantastic way to immerse yourself in the fascinating history of one of the world’s most famous universities.

news.title: Live Report: My Bloody Valentine triumph at 3Arena
news.summary: Shoegaze legends deliver stunningly powerful hometown show.

news.title: Bell X1 announce summer shows in Limerick, Cork, Dublin and Galway
news.summary: Tickets go on sale this Friday, 28 November at 10am.

news.title: Royel Otis announce Fairview Park gig
news.summary: Listen to their latest album Hickey below.

news.title: KNEECAP announce biggest headline show to date in London's Crystal Palace Park
news.summary: Tickets go on sale on Friday, November 28.

news.title: The Scratch announce Dublin show
news.summary: Tickets will go on sale Friday, November 28 at 9am.
